title: 3.2 Master Challenge 1
question: Open the Color Circles project you created for the master challenge in the last sprint. Make changes in the program such that the backdrop switches to yellow when the sprite touches the yellow circle. Also, a square should be drawn on the yellow backdrop, simultaneously.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
